name: Wordgrams - Word Search Games
description:
Wordgrams - the most popular and modern word puzzle game, played by millions of people around the world! You'll never experience a dull moment after playing this most addictive word puzzle game!

Word Grams, words are hiding in the grams! Now, you are the word finder! Swipe the word letters and combine the word letters into different new words! You will get rewards in Word Grams once you make correct word combinations in this word puzzle game!

Try this world's best word puzzle game – Word Grams to improve the "word-base" in your clever brain and become the king of the most interesting word puzzle game – Word GramsGrams!

How to Play Word Grams:
- In Word Grams, words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backward.
- Simply swipe your finger over a word in the word grams to select it.
- If you've found a valid word in the word grams, the word will remain highlighted and marked on the word list above the word grams as found.

As a word search, word scramble and word puzzle game, Word Grams is absolutely the best time killer with incredibly addictive word finder features!

Word Grams Main Features:
- Easy to learn and enjoy.
- Thousands of levels to choose, Word Grams is always exciting and challenging.
- Words with friends! Enjoy the words puzzle game time with your friends and play against them!
- Exciting daily word puzzle game challenge!
- Word Grams needs no wifi. You can play the most interesting word searching game anytime and anywhere.
- Easily check previous word levels and play word puzzle game again!
- Delicate UI design and tasty word letters in Word Grams!
- Special extra words are waiting to be discovered!
- Easily get hints in Word Grams!
- More themes and word levels of Word Grams are coming soon.

Word Grams is offering you a new way to play word puzzle game. Get fun as well as knowledge in Word Grams at the same time. Share Word Grams to your friends and family. Enjoy and check who's the best in word puzzle game and who`s the king in word searching!
